frame.name: Hospitality
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Host</fen> is judged regarding their attitude as a potential host in a guest-host relationship. The <fen>Host</fen> exhibits a <fen>Behavior</fen> that is judged as demonstrating a particular degree hospitality towards a <fen>Guest</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Host</fen> may reveal an <fen>Expressor</fen> that indicates a particular sort of attitude.
<ex>I found <fex name="Host">the board</fex> to be <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>hospitable</t> <fex name="Guest">to Russian graduates</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Host
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Host</fen> is the person whose <fen>Behavior</fen> towards others as a (potential) host is evaluated.</def-root>

FE.name: Guest
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Guest</fen> is the entity which is positively or negatively treated by the <fen>Host</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Behavior
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Behavior</fen> is the action of the <fen>Host</fen> on which the evaluation of the <fen>Host</fen>'s character is based.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> is the extent to which the <fen>Host</fen> exhibits the particular <fen>Behavior</fen> towards others.</def-root>

FE.name: Topic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Topic</fen> is the situation or person that the <fen>Host</fen>'s <fen>Behavior</fen> responds to or is related to.</def-root>

FE.name: Expressor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Expressor</fen> is the body part or action by a body part which indicates the character of the <fen>Host</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> is the way in which the <fen>Host</fen> embodies the characters of a good or poor host.</def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the evaluation.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: hospitality.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: willingness to warmly and coridally accept guests.

lexUnit.name: red carpet.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: respectful and lavish treatment of an important guest.
